name: shelve
title: Shelve
description: Share secrets securely without an account. Set expiration time, control number of reads, and ensure encrypted transmission.

commands.name: encrypt
commands.title: Encrypt
commands.description: Share secrets securely without an account
commands.subtitle: Secure secret sharing

commands.name: decrypt
commands.title: Decrypt
commands.description: Decrypt secrets securely without an account
commands.subtitle: Secure secret decryption

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: xulobeats
